longBusinessSummary.0: Balkrishna Industries Limited manufactures and sells tires worldwide. It offers rubber tires, tubes, and carbon black products. The company provides off-highway tires for use in various applications, such as agricultural, industrial and construction, earthmoving and port, mining, forestry, lawn and garden, and all-terrain vehicles. It sells its products through a network of distributors. The company was incorporated in 1961 and is headquartered in Mumbai, India.
